channel.title: Verizon 718/753 24/7 VPS
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/axczns.jpg[/img]
Welcome! Verizon718 is a fairly new server that is trying to bring you everything you need and want when looking for a RSPS, we are a Rune-Evo V3 based server (credits where applies). That is picking up where a already sucessfull server left off. we offer 24/7 uptime with 0 lag and dedicated staff that will help you with whatever you need!
Visit our website here to get started today! [URL=http://"http://www.verizon718.com/forums"]http://www.verizon718.com/forums[/URL]
If you want to jump right into the game click this link! [URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/9wpyoipb64y1ud4/verizon718.jar?dl=1&token_hash=AAHZje4V6yKIHRE0_O2NqpnfN4mpf2TzXsAInq_e941-xA"]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/9wpyoipb64y1ud4/verizon718.jar?dl=1&token_hash=AAHZje4V6yKIHRE0_O2NqpnfN4mpf2TzXsAInq_e941-xA[/URL]
Some features Verizon 718 has to offer! -Webclient -Download Client -Blink boss -Nex boss -Corporal boss & More! -100% Godwars -100% Curses -Torva,Vesta,Chaotic, and Korasi & More ! -Flawless PVP -100% Skilling ! -100% Specials ! -Hybrid Armours (Vanguard,Trickster,Battlemage) - 100% working Nex armour -Virtus wand and book! -Drygore weapons -Fun minigames! All Working! & More ! -100% all working skills -Overloads Working 100% -Followers/Summons Working 100% -Picture's below Blink: [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3883961/Blink.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3883961/Blink.png[/img][/url] Torva, Vesta, Chaotic, Korasi: [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3883965/Torva_Vesta_Korasi_Chaotic.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3883965/Torva_Vesta_Korasi_Chaotic.png[/img][/url] Queen Black Dragon: [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3883968/QueenBlackDragon.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3883968/QueenBlackDragon.png[/img][/url] Curses: [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3883973/Curses.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3883973/Curses.png[/img][/url] Prayer 100% Working: [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3883978/Prayer.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3883978/Prayer.png[/img][/url] Razor Whip & More: [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3883990/Random.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3883990/Random.png[/img][/url] 3rd Age & Void, And More ! [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3883994/3rd_Age_Void_and_More.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3883994/3rd_Age_Void_and_More.png[/img][/url] Overloads 100% Working!: [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3883995/Overloads.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3883995/Overloads.png[/img][/url] 100% Working Followers/Summons: [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3883996/FollowerShop.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3883996/FollowerShop.png[/img][/url] [b]NEW UPDATES:[/b] [b]NEW HOME[/b]: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/35hobk1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2oc2e.jpg[/img] [b]NEW[/b] VARROCK GENERAL STORE: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/eagolf.jpg[/img] [b]NEW[/b] SLAYER SHOP: [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/wjf0hk.jpg[/img] [b]NEW[/b] VARROCK MAGE STORE: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/13z7rkj.jpg[/img] [b]NEW[/b] BOSS CONTRACTS: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/5oz08z.jpg[/img] [b]NEW[/b] LOYALTY SHOP: [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/20r8bd5.jpg[/img] [b]NEW[/b] VARROCK MINE AND WOODCUTTING SHOP: [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/1h4g7s.jpg[/img] CHANGE PRAYERS AND SPELLS: [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/1etp1t.jpg[/img] [b]NEW[/b] VARROCK PK GEAR: [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2lctsti.jpg[/img] [b]NEW[/b] LOWES ARCHERY SHOP VARROCK: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/27zgs1v.png[/img] [b]NEW[/b] VARROCK BANK: [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/fd5bip.jpg[/img] [b]MORE UPDATES AND PICTURES COMING SOON ![/b]

item.title: Verizon 718/753 24/7 VPS
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I don’t know what it is but that entire picture is showing for the entire white space and the reason the thread is going to the right, fix it please.

Anyway, add more pictures as it is mate - if you want more attention and to attract players, a lot of them either want at least one video and perhaps five-ten pictures depending on what you show, which need to be unique might I add.

Read full topic
